episodes.title: Virginia Giuffre’s Family Speak Out After Her Tragic Death | This Morning
episodes.description:
She was at the centre of one of the biggest scandals in modern history. After tragically taking her own life earlier this year, Virginia Roberts Giuffre, the most prominent accuser of disgraced pedophile Jeffrey Epstein, is continuing her fight for justice from beyond the grave. In her new memoir, she reflects on how she was drawn into Epstein’s world as a teenager and the years of abuse that followed, being trafficked to a succession of wealthy and powerful men, including claims of three sexual encounters with Prince Andrew. Today, her brother and sister-in-law join us to share her story and to continue her commitment to giving a voice to victims

Broadcast on 21/10/2025

episodes.title: 'We Escaped One Of The Most Shocking Cults, And It Was In This Country' | This Morning
episodes.description:
For years, Hope Bastine and Verity Carter suffered in silence as they were subjected to shocking abuse while growing up in the notorious 'Children of God' cult. But after separately managing to escape the institution’s clutches - the British women are speaking out about their traumatic experiences, in a new five-part documentary. And today, they’re bravely joining us in the studio to share the realities of life inside the chilling cult. 
Broadcast on 25/08/21

episodes.title: I Escaped a Cult After 28 Years | This Morning
episodes.description:
Subscribe now for more! http://bit.ly/1JM41yF
From the age of four Claire Ashman lived under the oppressive regime of a religious cult, where she was mentally abused, isolated and repeatedly left terrified after being told the world was going to end. After years of being brainwashed, Claire finally found the courage to escape with her eight children, for a new life and a new world. 
Broadcast on 31/03/2017
